TopupInfo.Title: Credit Purchase
TopupInfo.SubtitleIos: If the credits purchased through the iOS app are not in your account, check for a 'Pending' transaction from Apple; this may take 24-48 hours to process. If the status changes but the credits have not been added, send us your Apple receipt so we may assist you with the issue.
TopupInfo.SubtitleAndroid: If the credits purchased through the Android app are not in your account, check for a 'Pending' transaction from Google Play; this may take 24-48 hours to process. If the status changes but the credits have not been added, send us your Google Play receipt so we may assist you with the issue.

Coachmark.SubtitleTopFans: A report on your top fans' ranking based on their contributions
Coachmark.SubtitleFansInteraction: Percentage of fans that interaction with your content
Coachmark.SubtitleFansAge: Percentage of your fans sorted by age
Coachmark.SubtitleFansGender: Percentages of gender identities that make up your fanbase
Coachmark.SubtitleFansCountry: Fans and their country of origin
Coachmark.SubtitleBeam&Sub: Monitor your Beam and sub income here
Coachmark.SubtitleMyIncome: You can view of Beam and subscription trend to help your engagement decision

Coachmark.SubtitlePostEngagementRate: Measure your engagement rate for every post you've created
Coachmark.SubtitleMyMusic: You can view your album and song summary
Coachmark.SubtitlePopularAlbum: This is your most popular album based on your audience engagement
